elementAttacks.name: Boulder
elementAttacks.description: Hurls a massive boulder at the opponent, causing them to be stunned.

elementAttacks.name: Wave
elementAttacks.description: Summons a powerful wave that drenches the enemy, reducing their speed.

elementAttacks.name: Wind
elementAttacks.description: Creates a powerful gust of wind that pushes the enemy back, delaying their next move.

elementAttacks.name: Lightning
elementAttacks.description: Strikes the enemy with a bolt of lightning, paralyzing them temporarily.

elementAttacks.name: Fire
elementAttacks.description: Unleashes flames that cause the target to take burning damage over time.

elementAttacks.name: Growth
elementAttacks.description: Promotes rapid growth, healing the user and boosting their stats.

elementAttacks.name: Decay
elementAttacks.description: Causes the enemy to decay, reducing their stats over time.

elementAttacks.name: Light
elementAttacks.description: Blinds the enemy with a burst of light, reducing their accuracy.

elementAttacks.name: Shadow
elementAttacks.description: Shrouds the enemy in darkness, causing them to flee in fear.

elementAttacks.name: Love
elementAttacks.description: Charms the enemy, causing them to act against their allies.

elementAttacks.name: Malice
elementAttacks.description: Infuses the enemy with malice, causing them to attack themselves.

elementAttacks.name: Wisdom
elementAttacks.description: Enlightens the user, increasing their attack and defense.

elementAttacks.name: Hubris
elementAttacks.description: Exploits the enemy's overconfidence, dealing massive damage.

specialAttack.name: Discus Throw
specialAttack.effect: Hurls a mighty discus at the enemy, dealing damage and stunning them for the next turn.

ultraAttack.name: Herculean Strength
ultraAttack.effect: +30% Attack & Speed for all friendly cards on the board.

classAttacks.name: Beast
classAttacks.effect: Summons a powerful beast to attack the enemy.

specialAttack.name: Savage Pounce
specialAttack.effect: A ferocious leap deals extra damage and causes the enemy to flinch, lowering their attack power.

ultraAttack.name: Pack Ambush
ultraAttack.effect: Summons a pack of beasts to attack all enemies at once, reducing their speed.

classAttacks.name: Blessing
classAttacks.effect: Restores a small amount of HP and boosts defense.

specialAttack.name: Divine Favor
specialAttack.effect: A holy light restores HP to all allies and grants them increased resistance to debuffs.

ultraAttack.name: Divine Blessing
ultraAttack.effect: All allies gain 30% HP back & 20% Defense boost.

specialAttack.name: Explosive Barrage
specialAttack.effect: Fires a rapid volley of cannonballs, dealing damage to all enemies.

classAttacks.name: Curse
classAttacks.effect: Afflicts the enemy with a weakening hex, reducing their attack power.

specialAttack.name: Hex Mark
specialAttack.effect: Places a dark curse on the enemy, lowering their attack and speed for 3 turns.

ultraAttack.name: Eternal Curse
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies permanently lose 15% Attack & Speed.

classAttacks.name: Decree
classAttacks.effect: Forces the enemy to skip their turn.

specialAttack.name: Royal Command
specialAttack.effect: Issues a commanding decree that forces the enemy to skip their next turn and lowers their morale, reducing their attack power.

ultraAttack.name: Absolute Decree
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies skip their next turn.

specialAttack.name: Lucid Nightmare
specialAttack.effect: Plunges the enemy into a vivid nightmare, putting them to sleep and dealing damage over time for 3 turns.

ultraAttack.name: Endless Dream
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies sleep for 2 turns. They wake up if hit, but take double damage.

classAttacks.name: Influence
classAttacks.effect: Persuades the enemy to lower their guard, reducing their defense.

specialAttack.name: Compel
specialAttack.effect: Forces the enemy to act against their will, skipping their next turn.

ultraAttack.name: Mass Hysteria
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies attack each other (50% chance per enemy to randomly hit an ally or themselves).

classAttacks.name: Luck
classAttacks.effect: Increases critical hit chance for the next attack.

specialAttack.name: Gambler’s Favor
specialAttack.effect: Increases the user's attack power significantly, but has a 50% chance of missing.

ultraAttack.name: Opportunist
ultraAttack.effect: User attacks twice next turn, both guaranteed crits.

classAttacks.name: Medicine
classAttacks.effect: Restores a small amount of HP and removes minor debuffs.

specialAttack.name: Panacea
specialAttack.effect: Fully restores HP of one ally and cures all status effects.

ultraAttack.name: Comforts of Home
ultraAttack.effect: Fully heals 1 ally and removes all debuffs.

classAttacks.name: Prophecy
classAttacks.effect: Marks an enemy with a doomed fate, dealing heavy damage after 2 turns.

specialAttack.name: Fated End
specialAttack.effect: Marks an enemy for destruction—after 1 turn, they take 30% of their max HP as damage.

ultraAttack.name: Judgment Foretold
ultraAttack.effect: Marks all enemies—after 2 turns, they take 40% of their max HP as damage.

classAttacks.name: Vine
classAttacks.effect: Entangles the enemy, reducing their speed and evasion.

specialAttack.name: Strangling Roots
specialAttack.effect: Roots the enemy in place, preventing movement and dealing damage over time.

ultraAttack.name: Overgrowth
ultraAttack.effect: All enemies immobilized for 2 turns. -25% Speed.
